title: Die Hard
creator_credit: Gordon Company, Silver Pictures, 20th Century Fox, Beau Marks, Jackson De Govia, Marilyn Vance, Matthew Yuricich, John McTiernan, Joel Silver, Lawrence Gordon, Steven E. de Souza and Jeb Stuart
brief_description: NYPD cop John McClane’s plan to reconcile with his estranged wife is thrown for a serious loop when, minutes after he arrives at her office, the entire building is overtaken by a group of terrorists. With little help from the LAPD, wisecracking McClane sets out to single-handedly rescue the hostages and bring the bad guys down.

constellations_other.name: Elevator Operator: Up and down, the on-screen gift of elevators
constellations_other.description: Inspired by Courtney Barnett playing an elevator operator in her hit song of the same name, we look at how they're used on-screen for comedy, drama and suspense, with the small, confined boxes forcing characters to physically confront each other.
